verses.verse: <S%H4069>"Why<s%> are <S%H6256>times<s%> not <S%H6845>stored<s%> up by the <S%H7706>Almighty,<s%> And why do those who <S%H3045>know<s%> Him not <S%H2372>see<s%> His <S%H3117>days<s%>?
"Some <S%H5381>remove<s%> the <S%H1367>landmarks;<s%> They <S%H1497>seize<s%> and <S%H7462>devour<s%> <S%H5739>flocks.<s%>
"They <S%H5090>drive<s%> <S%H5090>away<s%> the <S%H2543>donkeys<s%> of the <S%H3490>orphans;<s%> They <S%H9111>take<s%> the widow's <S%H7794>ox<s%> for a <S%H9111>pledge.<s%>

"They <S%H5186>push<s%> the <S%H34>needy<s%> <S%H5186>aside<s%> from the <S%H1870>road;<s%> The <S%H6041>poor<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> are made to <S%H2244>hide<s%> themselves <S%H3162>altogether.<s%>

<S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> as <S%H6501>wild<s%> <S%H6501>donkeys<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> They <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H7836>seeking<s%> <S%H2964>food<s%> in their <S%H6467>activity,<s%> As <S%H3899>bread<s%> for [their] <S%H5288>children<s%> in the <S%H6160>desert.<s%>
"They <S%H7114>harvest<s%> their <S%H1098>fodder<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> And they <S%H3953>glean<s%> the <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>

"They <S%H3885>spend<s%> the <S%H3885>night<s%> <S%H6174>naked,<s%> <S%H1097>without<s%> <S%H3830>clothing,<s%> And <S%H369>have<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3682>covering<s%> against the <S%H7135>cold.<s%>
"They are <S%H7372>wet<s%> with the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H2230>rains,<s%> And they <S%H2263>hug<s%> the <S%H6697>rock<s%> for <S%H1097>want<s%> of a <S%H4268>shelter.<s%>
"Others <S%H1497>snatch<s%> the <S%H3490>orphan<s%> from the <S%H9582>breast,<s%> And <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> they <S%H9111>take<s%> a <S%H9111>pledge.<s%>

"They cause [the poor] to <S%H1980>go<s%> about <S%H6174>naked<s%> <S%H1097>without<s%> <S%H3830>clothing,<s%> And they <S%H5375>take<s%> <S%H5375>away<s%> the <S%H6016>sheaves<s%> from the <S%H7457>hungry.<s%>
<S%H996>"Within<s%> the <S%H7791>walls<s%> they <S%H6671>produce<s%> <S%H6671>oil;<s%> They <S%H1869>tread<s%> <S%H3342>wine<s%> <S%H3342>presses<s%> but <S%H6770>thirst.<s%>

"From the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H4962>men<s%> <S%H5008>groan,<s%> And the <S%H5315>souls<s%> of the <S%H2491>wounded<s%> <S%H7768>cry<s%> out; Yet <S%H433>God<s%> does not <S%H7760>pay<s%> <S%H7760>attention<s%> to <S%H8604>folly.<s%>

<S%H1992>"Others<s%> have <S%H1961>been<s%> with those who <S%H4775>rebel<s%> against the <S%H216>light;<s%> They do not want to <S%H5234>know<s%> its <S%H1870>ways,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> <S%H3427>abide<s%> in its <S%H9350>paths.<s%>
"The <S%H7523>murderer<s%> <S%H6965>arises<s%> at <S%H216>dawn;<s%> He <S%H6991>kills<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and the <S%H34>needy,<s%> And at <S%H3915>night<s%> he is as a <S%H1590>thief.<s%>

"And the <S%H5869>eye<s%> of the <S%H5003>adulterer<s%> <S%H8104>waits<s%> for the <S%H5399>twilight,<s%> <S%H559>Saying,<s%> <S%H3808>'No<s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%> will <S%H7789>see<s%> me.' And he <S%H7760>disguises<s%> <S%H5643><s%> his <S%H6440>face.<s%>
"In the <S%H2822>dark<s%> they <S%H2864>dig<s%> into <S%H1004>houses,<s%> They <S%H2856>shut<s%> themselves up by <S%H3119>day;<s%> They do not <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H216>light.<s%>

"For the <S%H1242>morning<s%> is the <S%H9191>same<s%> to him as <S%H6757>thick<s%> <S%H6757>darkness,<s%> For he is <S%H5234>familiar<s%> with the <S%H1091>terrors<s%> of <S%H6757>thick<s%> <S%H6757>darkness.<s%>

"They are <S%H7031>insignificant<s%> on the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H4325>water;<s%> Their <S%H2513>portion<s%> is <S%H7043>cursed<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%> They do not <S%H6437>turn<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H3754>vineyards.<s%>
<S%H6723>"Drought<s%> and <S%H2527>heat<s%> <S%H1497>consume<s%> the <S%H7950>snow<s%> <S%H4325>waters,<s%> [So does] <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> [those who] have <S%H2398>sinned.<s%>

"A <S%H7358>mother<s%> will <S%H7911>forget<s%> him; The <S%H7415>worm<s%> <S%H4985>feeds<s%> <S%H4985>sweetly<s%> till he is <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more.<s%> And <S%H9390>wickedness<s%> will be <S%H7665>broken<s%> like a <S%H6086>tree.<s%>
"He <S%H7462>wrongs<s%> the <S%H6135>barren<s%> <S%H6135>woman,<s%> And <S%H3190>does<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3190>good<s%> for the <S%H490>widow.<s%>
"But He <S%H4900>drags<s%> off the <S%H47>valiant<s%> by His <S%H3581>power;<s%> He <S%H6965>rises,<s%> but <S%H3808>no<s%> one <S%H539>has<s%> <S%H539>assurance<s%> of <S%H9132>life.<s%>
"He <S%H5414>provides<s%> them with <S%H983>security,<s%> and they are <S%H8172>supported;<s%> And His <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are on their <S%H1870>ways.<s%>

"They are <S%H7426>exalted<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H4592>while,<s%> then they are <S%H369>gone;<s%> Moreover, they are <S%H4355>brought<s%> <S%H4355>low<s%> and like <S%H3605>everything<s%> <S%H7092>gathered<s%> up; Even like the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H7641>grain<s%> they are <S%H9268>cut<s%> <S%H9268>off.<s%>
"Now <S%H518>if<s%> it is not <S%H645>so,<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H3576>prove<s%> me a <S%H3576>liar,<s%> And <S%H7760>make<s%> my <S%H4405>speech<s%> <S%H408>worthless<s%>?"
